scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=@pediaquiz/types && npm run build --workspace=@pediaquiz/functions && npm run build --workspace=@pediaquiz/frontend
scripts.clean: npm cache clean --force && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && find ./workspaces -name 'node_modules' -type d -exec rm -rf {} + && find ./workspaces -name 'package-lock.json' -type f -delete
scripts.deploy:functions: npm run build --workspace=@pediaquiz/functions && firebase deploy --only functions
scripts.deploy:hosting: npm run build --workspace=@pediaquiz/frontend && firebase deploy --only hosting
